id3VybDovL2RvY3MudjEvZG9jOjAwOTkxMTM3ZWY.value: The Group manages its products and services through its three global businesses: Global Banking and Markets ('GBM'); Commercial Banking ('CMB'); Wealth and Personal Banking ('WPB'); and the Corporate Centre (comprising, certain legacy assets, central stewardship costs, and interests in our associates and joint ventures)
